basics.name: Dmitry Ivanov
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Originally from Saint-Petersburg, Russia. Earned Master's degree in Computer Graphics (CS) at Baltic State Technical University. Started as UI freelance designer taking part in local startups and projects, then performed at kudago.com as a UI-designer / frontend developer. Dmitry moved to Montreal, Canada, where he collaborated with local businesses (TTBA, Amazemontreal, Rage Academy) and contributed to open-source. Afterwards he worked at Plotly Inc. as WebGL specialist, then at Mobeewave, specialized in payments systems, later transitioned to Apple into Wallet and Payments teams.

work.name: Elevenlabs

highlights: Samsung Point of Sale web app
Admin portal app based on aspect-oriented framework

work.summary: Plotly.js is javascript graphing library that powers plotly. Held position of resident webgl specialist.

Best in class scatterplot point clustering algorithm
